item.description:
Harvard Biotech Club Annual Career Fair: November 3, Save the Date!

Harvard Biotech Clubâ€™s Annual Career Fair will be held on November 3rd, 2010, at Harvard Medical School. Registration by Sep 30, 2010 and save $150!

For more information, visit, http://www.thebiotech...

**Recruiting Companies: If you are interested in participating in the career fair this year, please email careerfair@thebiotechclub.org
